item.description:
Although psychic healing varies by region and practitioner, it usually follows some common lines. In days of old you may have learned much through your family's folk tales. However, in the modern world, very few of us have had the lucky advantage of sitting by our great-grandmother's knee to learn such things. This class uses both Eastern and Western practices to guide you in helping your friends and family through understanding and balancing energies. By helping others we in turn also help ourselves.

Class begins at 6PM with an Open Circle to follow
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Psychic Healing
